title: China didn't warn public of likely pandemic for 6 crucial days: AP probe
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping warned the public on Jan. 20 of a new coronavirus, predominantly concentrated in Wuhan. But by that time, more than 3,000 people had been infected during almost a week of public silence, according to internal documents obtained by…
content: In the six days after top Chinese officials secretly determined they likely were facing a pandemic from a new coronavirus, the city of Wuhan at the epicentre of the disease hosted a mass banquet for tens of thousands of people, and millions began travelling t… [+13228 chars]
